title: I can't access to my League Of Legend
body: When I click to an icon , it doesn't appear any home page to let me play League Of legend  please help me

replies.body: Do you see a specific error, a black screen, or any sort of visual before it simply doesn't work?

No I don't see anything it just a big icon og League Of Legend  in the middle on screen and i wait for next 10 minute . My home page didn't appear, it just had a big icon  T-T  can you help me , please?

Does this still occur if you launch League as admin? Right-click on it and select "run as administrator" to do this.

If you're still seeing this issue after launching League as admin, it could mean that the patcher isn't reaching the patching servers, which causes the app to not start. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused or exacerbated by local network settings.

Let me know if this caused any change.
